verses.roman:
ei līlā sva-granthe raghunātha-dāsa
gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣe kairāchena prakāśa

synonyms: ei līlā—this pastime; sva-granthe—in his book; raghunātha-dāsa—Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī; gaurāṅga-stava-kalpa-vṛkṣe—named Gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣa; kairāchena prakāśa—has fully described.
translation: Śrīla Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī has fully described this pastime in his book Gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣa.
